body: Turn to Frog and similar 'lose all abilities' effects are not removing triggered abilities (When attacks, When blocks etc)
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Lose all abilities

comments.body: Removing triggered abilities is implemented in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=4e10afffb7885137d7b4d4dd99b57493c85019c0 Note that static abilities are not removed.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on May 31, 2014 07:36:50_

Turn to Frog and similar 'lose all abilities' effects are not removing triggered abilities (When attacks, When blocks etc)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=607_
